#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 10000007
long long int dp[10005][10][10];
long long int fun(int runs,int balls,int wickets)
{
if(runs<=0)
return 1;
if(balls<=0)
return 1;
if(wickets<=0)
return 1;
long long int c=1;
if(dp[runs][balls][wickets]!=-1)
return dp[runs][balls][wickets];

c=c+fun(runs,balls-1,wickets);
c=c+fun(runs-1,balls-1,wickets);
c=c+fun(runs-2,balls-1,wickets);
c=c+fun(runs-3,balls-1,wickets);
c=c+fun(runs-4,balls-1,wickets);
c=c+fun(runs-6,balls-1,wickets);
c=c+fun(runs-1,balls,wickets);
c=c+fun(runs-1,balls,wickets);
c=c+fun(runs-2,balls,wickets);
c=c+fun(runs-2,balls,wickets);
c=c+fun(runs-3,balls,wickets);
c=c+fun(runs-5,balls,wickets);
c=c+fun(runs-5,balls,wickets);
c=c+fun(runs-7,balls,wickets);
c=c+fun(runs,balls-1,wickets-1);
dp[runs][balls][wickets]=c%MOD;
return dp[runs][balls][wickets];
}

int main()
{
int t,n;
scanf("%d",&t);
memset(dp,-1,sizeof dp);
for(int i=1;i<=t;i++)
{
scanf("%d",&n);

long long int ans=fun(n,6,6);
printf("Case %d: %lld\n",i,(ans%MOD));
}
return 0;
}
